alert.note: Alert for Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 27 at 4:48PM EDT until September 28 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following county, Collier. * WHEN...Until 745 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 445 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated feeder bands starting to form over the Gulf of Mexico which will move north northwest into the metro areas of Collier County during the next couple of hours. Rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected with the feeder bands. These rainfall amounts will cause minor flooding in the advisory area as the grounds are very saturated from heavy rains during the last several days. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naples, Marco Island, Golden Gate Estates, Lely Resort, Naples Manor, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Belle Meade, East Naples, Golden Gate, Marco Island Airport, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, North Naples, Naples Park, Orangetree, Cape Romano, Lely, Fiddlers Creek, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve and South Blocks Golde. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
